Edoras: A Dreary Prospect
TBD - rohirrim vs. Orcs
Pick up the food and carry it to Éowyn's room
Witwyn is in Meduseld.\n\nYou should speak with Witwyn.
TBD - oliphaunts
TBD - the horn and the rider
Examine Éowyn's room ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Return to Witwyn
TBD - rohirrim vs dunlending

'I am sure you think Lady Éowyn is bearing all of this very well, but I believe she isn't happy. A servant notices things, you know.\n\n'Do you want to see for yourself? Deliver her meal to her room and have a look around. Tell me what you think!'
TBD - war riders
Witwyn has grown concerned for Éowyn's state of mind, and invites you to have a look around the lady's room while you deliver her next meal.
Tapestries line the walls of Meduseld in Edoras.\n\nYou should examine the tapestries.
You have examined the magnificent tapestries lining the halls of Meduseld depicting the history of Rohan.
You have examined the magnificent tapestries lining the halls of Meduseld depicting the history of Rohan.
The previous plate of food brought to Éowyn has not been eaten
Éowyn's serving of food can be found on a table near the throne of Meduseld. Her room is to the left of the throne.\n\nYou should bring Éowyn's food to her room to await her.
The scuffs on the carpet show signs of restless pacing to and fro....
Completed
Dropped the food
Carry Éowyn's food to her room
Éowyn's room is in Meduseld.\n\nYou should examine Éowyn's room for signs that Witwyn is correct about the Lady's gloomy mood.
Delivered the food
A sword is laid upon the bed, unused
'You see? She hides it well, but her mood is alarming. It has gotten worse and worse as the king declined, but I do not think she has had a bite to eat since the king and Éomer left her here.'
The bed looks like it has not been slept on in a long while
